meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of cleistogamy.
meanings.sent1: The flowers bloomed cleistogamously, hidden from view.
meanings.sent2: The seeds were scattered cleistogamously across the forest floor.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel cleverly hid its acorns cleistogamously in various spots.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the ancient ruins were cleistogamously preserved over time.
meanings.sent5: The magician performed his tricks cleistogamously, leaving the audience in awe.

meanings.sent1: The cleistogamously sealed flowers remained unnoticed by passersby.
meanings.sent2: The cleistogamously pollinated plants thrived in the shaded areas.
meanings.sent3: The mysterious garden had a cleistogamously enchanting aura.
meanings.sent4: Her cleistogamously whispered words carried a sense of secrecy.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted a cleistogamously hidden message within its colors.

meanings.sent1: The cleistogamously growing vine spread rapidly along the fence.
meanings.sent2: The cleistogamously reproducing insects were studied by scientists.
meanings.sent3: The cleistogamously multiplying cells fascinated the researchers.
meanings.sent4: The cleistogamously reproducing fish population surprised the fishermen.
meanings.sent5: The cleistogamously blooming flowers attracted specialized pollinators.
